articles.description: After the announcement, IOCL shares rallied as much as 2.17% to touch 52-week high levels for a fourth straight day at ₹114 per share on BSE. In the last four trading sessions since Tuesday, IOCL has gained more than 10%.

articles.author: Trade Brains
articles.title: Mid cap stock jumps 9.5% after it inaugurated a new plant to manufacture Xiaomi Phones - Trade Brains
articles.description: On Friday, the shares of India's second-largest mobile phone maker rose 9.5 percent to Rs 6,034.95 per share after the company's subsidiary launched a new plant to make Xiaomi phones in India.
articles.content:

articles.title: ₹2,000 banknotes continue to be legal tender even as 97.26% of circulating banknotes return to RBI | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced that over 97 per cent of circulating  ₹2000 banknotes have returned till November 30, 2023. The central bank further added that the remaining circulating  ₹2000 banknotes will continue to be legal tender.

articles.title: UltraTech Cement’s new acquisition boosts bullish outlook, Jefferies recommends Buy with 11% upside target of Rs 9700 - The Financial Express
articles.description: Jeffries sees 11% upside potential in India’s largest cement producer, UltraTech Cement's stocks, following their acquisition of Kesoram Industries’ cement assets in a share-swap deal for an enterprise valuation of Rs 7,600 crore.
